title: Are there any hidden charges after the payment of fees?

content.title: No additional charges are necessary to pay after the fees of tuition, examination, and admission process is paid.

title: How does The Vision Medicos help in saving money?

points: The Vision Medicos provides affordable options for MBBS students.
We negotiate with partner universities to get the best deals for our students.
Our counselors provide guidance on scholarships and financial aid.

title: What kind of support does The Vision Medicos provide to students and parents?

content.title: The Vision Medicos offers a robust support system for both students and parents, ensuring regular updates and communication throughout the admission process.
points: Post-admission services including visa assistance and placement support.
Comprehensive guidance throughout the MBBS journey.

title: Why should I trust The Vision Medicos?

content.title: The Vision Medicos is a trusted partner for over 1000 students who have successfully completed their MBBS degrees with our guidance.
points: We have a team of seasoned and experienced career counselors.
No hidden costs or surprises â€“ we maintain complete transparency.

title: What is the experience of The Vision Medicos in the MBBS field?

content.title: The Vision Medicos has extensive experience in guiding students through the MBBS process.
points: Over 1000 students have pursued MBBS abroad through our guidance.
More than 200 students have completed their degrees and are now practicing in India and abroad.
We were among the first consultants to send students overseas for MBBS.

title: What services does The Vision Medicos provide after landing abroad?

points: Assistance with accommodation and settling in a new country.
Guidance on local laws and regulations, including visa-related support.
Support with finding internships, placements, and part-time work opportunities.
